snippet: The United States "has become the top destination for Chinese fugitives fleeing the law," China Daily reported, quoting a government official.
lead_paragraph: The United States "has become the top destination for Chinese fugitives fleeing the law," China Daily reported, quoting a government official.

headline.main: China Seeks More Than 150 Economic Fugitives in U.S.
headline.print_headline: China Seeks More Than 150 Economic Fugitives in U.S.
